Introduction

AQUA was a project girl group formed by Krazy Entertainment and gaming company, Actoz Soft, who will promote as both idols and gamers. They consist of Sua, Haesol, Hyeonju, Seungji, Hyerim, and Sihyun. They will begin promotions in November with the song, “Log In” and are managed by ex-Bulldok members, Hyungeun and Sora. In 2019, the group silently disbanded following the closure of KRAZY Entertainment.
